DOC.brief_summary: The main aim study evaluate safety , efficacy , compliance , usage epicutaneously apply IDEA-033 joint / musculoskeletal pain soft tissue inflammation .
DOC.detailed_description: Multi-centre , one arm , multiple dose , open-label , home usage study . Adult volunteer experience joint pain , musculoskeletal pain , stiffness , soft tissue inflammation screen study participation .
